title: Gingernut sandwich cookies
description: Dainty gingernut biscuits are given the gold star treatment, sandwiched with white chocolate ganache and topped with gold almonds.Equipment and preparation: you will need a pestle and mortar, a sugar thermometer, 2 x silicone mini-macaroon trays and a piping bag fitted with a round nozzle.
ingredients: ½ tsp freshly grated nutmeg, plus more to taste
125g/4½oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
1 thumb-sized piece stem ginger, grated very finely
